events.message: I received the wrong product and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this isn't what I ordered.
The case has been tagged under the refund category based on the customer's refund request and complaint about the product.
This case has been assigned to agent Sarah M., who specializes in refund and returns cases.
Hello, thank you for contacting support. I'm Sarah and I will help you with your refund request today.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product you received to help us process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 789456123 and I've attached a picture showing the item I got which is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately and send you a prepaid return label to send back the wrong product.
Thank you for the quick response, I appreciate the help and look forward to receiving the return label.
Your refund has been processed successfully, and you should see the amount credited to your account within 5-7 business days.
Just following up to ensure your refund was received and that you are satisfied with the resolution provided.
Since your refund is completed and there are no further concerns, this case will now be closed. Thank you for contacting support.
Please take a moment to fill out our satisfaction survey to help us improve our service in the future.
